level.heading: WAIVER (ยง 15-2626) The Commission may, for good cause, waive any rule under this Chapter unless theule contains a provision that is expressly required by statute.
SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5242 (June 23, 2000) [EXPIRED]; asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8315 (October 20, 2000); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2905 (March 19, 2004).
